div.div: Contribution of all GHG emissions (CO 2, N 2O, CH 4â€”expressed as CO 2-eq) from the major farming inputs in Minqin Oasis.
div.p: MM, manure management; EF, enteric fermentation; ICP, intensive crop production; ICLP, integrated crop-livestock production; IFLP, intensive livestock production (confined feeding); EGLP, extensive livestock production (grazing).
